entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,655Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 558

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Until We Are Whole Again
entry.summary:
Author: Wr1ting_adict

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,884Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1

Summary: He's a violent storm disguised as a man; she's a drowning creature disguised as a woman. Neither of them feel whole- and they believe they never will be. Drawn together by pure coincidence, a glance became a conversation, a conversation became a confession, a confession became a promise. She teaches him gentleness; he teaches her courage. She teaches him that chaos is harmful; he teaches her that silence is too. Slowly, their cracked souls start to heal. However, healing is never simple – nor always permanent. Some cracks refuse to close. Some scars refuse to heal. Some even continue to ache after they've been mended. Still, in the ruins of who they used to be; something tender began to bloom- a love forged from brokenness, from the fragile situation of being seen, from the scary miracle of being understood. And for the first time, they dare to ask themselves the same question- What if we're not meant to be whole alone?

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,623Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 71

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you’d take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn’t matter to you. If they needed help, they got it. When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.

entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,865Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 30

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?
